item.title: Let‚Äôs Understand Data Augmentation Using AugLy!üñºÔ∏èüíª
item.description: Data Augmentation allows to extend the existing actual data. Deep Learning models can benefit from this process. Image, Audio, Video and Text formats can be augmented using open-source Python libraries. In this article, I share different image augmentation techniques using AugLy, an augmentation library from Facebook. This article has been published as a part of Blogathon on Analytics Vidhya. Read the full article here.
